Articles.Content: Trying to download NovaPunch from Zippyshare, and whenever I click on the download button, it just pops open another Zippyshare window...??
I\'ve got an alternate uploading, I\'ll send it in a PM, then I\'ll take it down once you\'ve got it.
...Why not just post this in the mod\'s thread?
No idea, but I think this topic is done, since it says 1dl on my link, but he never PM\'d me back...
hey man could you send me the link to i really want it (0.16)

How about, "Don't download from zippyshare as whoever uploaded it does not have the right to do so" ?

Seriously guys, until Tiberion gets permission from SundayPunch, the NovaPunch pack is no more.

This thread dies now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
